Title: Born Again
Plot: After a detective and his former partner die in unexplained circumstances, the accidents are linked to a little girl who witnessed both deaths. Mulder believes that she may be the reincarnation of a policeman murdered by his colleagues.
GuestStars: Brian Markinson, Mimi Lieber, Maggie Wheeler, Dey Young, Andrea Libman, P. Lynn Johnson, Leslie Carlson, Richard Sali, Dwight Koss, Peter Lapres
